post.body: Josue is watching a friendly game of hold'em from the sidelines... Cuz I already lost... : (.
Josue is having birthday cake..
Josue is celebrating his bro-in-law's birthday..
Josue is ready for the road..
Josue is almost out of here... almost...
Josue is anxiously awaiting tomorrow morning to try out my new in-ear Apple headphones....
Josue is looking forward to a Pho-bulous lunch... With chicken of course.
Josue is thinking about the last 2.5 years..
Josue is ordering for "his friends"... Thank you.
Josue is making it final-final..
Josue is home, sweet home..
Josue is placing himself in the hot seat... Hmmm... Here we go!
Josue is burning through email..
Josue is pissed at his hi speed Internet provider. All circuits are down. Only my iPhone 3G to keep me warm. So cold. So very cold..
Josue is folding his Downy fresh choniz... Ahhhh..
Josue is happy about the free hour he just gained...
Josue is eating dinner in a junior high gym..
Josue is at church with Panda..
Josue is fighting sleep.... yawn... and learning about HD...
Josue is still sick from the beginning of the first quarter...whew!
Josue is waiting to heat up his rice...
Josue is done making sopa de arroz for tomorrow's pot luck. It came out just a little spicy..
Josue is working through his second straight hour of meetings..
Josue is slowly feeling like himself again...
Josue is up and feeling okay. Just okay. Let's give this a shot.
Josue is afraid to eat.
Josue is officially sick with 100 degree fever and a bucket at his side.... Dang it.
Josue is running to a meeting..
Josue is fighting sleep... and asking why?....
Josue is having split pea soup at Pea Soup Andersens in Santa Nella... Mmmmm..
Josue is yelling FIGHT ON!!! from the MO VAL!!! USC Rose Bowl Champions!!!
Josue is glad it's 2009...Feliz AÃ±o Nuevo!!!
Josue is playing a mix between Red Light, Green Light and Simon Says with Zoe and her Nina..
Josue is ringing in the new year Rancho Rivera style... con elote, tamales y uvas! CHEOW!
Josue is planning out the next 36 hours...
Josue is about to log in to do some work. Yes, work-work.
Josue is going to dinner with his wife and a good friend...
Josue is proof reading for his wife...
Josue is done cleaning the bathroom..
Josue is enjoying the treat his wife bought him for standing in line at 3 different stores while she looked around...ahhhh..
Josue is still half sick but enjoying Clifton's Cafeteria with his wife in downtown LA...
Josue is wide awake..
Josue is watching Don Francisco and Sabado Gigante...
Josue is now watching Jonathan, Zoe, Kari and Lexi play the bee game..
Josue is watching Kung Fu Panda with his niece and nephews... Skadoosh!!!..
Josue is watching his father-in-law learn to play Guitar Hero.
Josue is waiting at Rancho Rivera for the Sac-town Riveras to drive up.
Josue is learning that Short Round / Data actually graduated from USC... And his name is NOT Bryan... (nick).
Josue is just getting home from Xmas in the Mo Val... Happy Holidays everyone!!!
Josue is watching the girls make tamales at Grandpa V's..
